p: The immortalized human keratinocytes cell line HaCaT (obtained from the Skin Biochemistry Research Laboratory, Life Science Institute, Hebrew University, Jerusalem) were maintained in 10% Dulbecco's modified Eagle medium (Gibco Life Technologies, USA) containing penicillin (100 U/ml), streptomycin (100 mg/ml), and 10% fetal calf serum (FCS) at 37°C in a humidified atmosphere containing 5% CO 2.
